products.title: Faux Suede Deluxe Black Curtain
products.metadescription: Faux Suede Deluxe Black Curtain in Black. Made to measure from £21.56 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Faux Suede Deluxe range of fabric has proven to be one of our most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous Roman blinds and curtains. 
 The Faux Suede Black Deluxe curtain in a lovely black colour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. 
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR0002 Fabric Colour: Black Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Panama Black Curtain
products.metadescription: Panama Black Curtain in Black. Made to measure from £23.30 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Panama range is avilable in a full rainbow of colours so we are sure you will find the shade to compliment your décor. 
 
These 100% cotton black curtains are classic and so are the perfect choice to add style and elegance to any room in your home. 
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR0112 Fabric Colour: Black Material: 100% Cotton Panama Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Basket Weave Black Curtain
products.metadescription: Basket Weave Black Curtain in Black. Made to measure from £26.40 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Basket Weave range is a combination of the soft fabric and attractive colours. Available as curtains and Roman blinds, you will be able to find the one that suits your style. 
 The Basket Weave Black curtain is an excellent choice to transform your home. 
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR0019 Fabric Colour: Black Material: 73%Polyester 27%Viscose Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes
